languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a heavy rock saw.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} собирается с силами для сокрушительного выпада. Его следующая атака в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} отталкивает противника. Расстояние {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивания{/g} составляет {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} клеток.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} нельзя применять при использовании камнерезки.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter gathers all their strength to deliver a crushing blow. Their next melee attack has a greater chance of pushing the enemy away.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a chainsaw.
The Fighter gathers all their strength for a crushing strike. Their next melee attack has a greater Push force. The Push force influences the chance to Push an enemy as well as the Push distance.

The Fighter gathers all their strength for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of that push is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a chainsaw.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a heavy rock saw.

traits.locale_text: Воин собирается с силами для сокрушительного выпада. Его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака в ближнем бою{/g} отталкивает противника. Расстояние отталкивания cоставляет <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g} / 2)</u> клеток.

Воин собирается с силами для сокрушительного выпада. Его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака в ближнем бою{/g} отталкивает противника. Расстояние отталкивания cоставляет <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g} / 2)</u> клеток.

Воин собирается с силами для сокрушительного выпада. Его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака в ближнем бою{/g} отталкивает противника. Расстояние отталкивания cоставляет {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} клеток.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}积蓄全身力量，猛击敌人。下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会将敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}格。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}无法与重型岩锯配合使用。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}积蓄全身力量，猛击敌人。下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会将敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}格。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}无法与重型岩锯配合使用。
战士积蓄全身力量，猛击敌人。下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会将敌人推开。推开距离为{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}格。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} asesta un golpe devastador con todas sus fuerzas. Su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} empuja al enemigo. La distancia recorrida por el {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujón{/g} es igual a {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} casillas.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no se puede usar con una sierra pesada de roca.

Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no se puede usar con una sierra pesada de roca.

El guerrero asesta un golpe devastador con todas sus fuerzas. Su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} empuja al enemigo. La distancia recorrida por el empujón es igual a {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} casillas.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} bündelt seine ganze Macht für einen vernichtenden Hieb. Sein nächster {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} stößt den Feind weg. Die Distanz dieses {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stoßes{/g} entspricht {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} Feldern.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mit einer schweren Felssäge nicht eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a heavy rock saw.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} bündelt seine ganze Macht für einen vernichtenden Hieb. Sein nächster {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} stößt den Feind weg. Die Distanz dieses {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stoßes{/g} entspricht {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} Feldern.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mit einer schweren Felssäge nicht eingesetzt werden.

Der Kämpfer bündelt seine ganze Kraft für einen vernichtenden Hieb. Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} stößt den Gegner weg. Die Distanz dieses Stoßes entspricht {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} Felder.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} rassemble toutes ses forces pour asséner une frappe dévastatrice. Son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} l'ennemi de {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cases.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut pas être utilisée avec une disqueuse lourde.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} rassemble toutes ses forces pour asséner une frappe dévastatrice. Son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} l'ennemi de {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cases.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut pas être utilisée avec une disqueuse lourde.

Le Combattant rassemble toutes ses forces pour mener une frappe dévastatrice. Son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante repousse l'ennemi. La distance de cette offensive est égale à {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cases.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Guerrier{/g} rassemble toutes ses forces pour mener une frappe dévastatrice. Son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante repousse l'ennemi de {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cases.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut pas être utilisée avec une tronçonneuse.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が一撃に全身全霊の力を込め、次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を吹き飛ばせるようになる。{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}距離は{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}セル。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はヘヴィロックソーとは併用できない。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a heavy rock saw.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が一撃に全身全霊の力を込め、次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を吹き飛ばせるようになる。{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}距離は{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}セル。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はヘヴィロックソーとは併用できない。
一撃のために全身全霊の力を込める。次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が敵を吹き飛ばすようになる。吹き飛ばす距離は{uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}セル。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g} yıkıcı bir darbe için tüm gücünü toplar. Bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} düşmanı iterek uzaklaştırır. {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}İtiş{/g} mesafesi {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} hücreye eşittir.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, ağır kaya testeresi ile kullanılamaz.
